name: Ricardo B. Burch
review: With a better processor, you get better battery life (Because the CPU finish the task faster), you get better camera photo processing, you get better performance in apps and games...So unless you're taking pictures endlessly on your phone, this phone surpass even a flagship android at half the price.

name: Mitzi A. Dawson
review: It's the Intel modem, Pineapple had a disagreement with Qualcomm and used Intel modem in this phone instead and it's not as good. Qualcomm modems are back in i uPhone 12 and 13.

name: Linda T. Richmond
review: Jumped ship back to uphone , this my first ever pro ! Got fed up with all the updates on samsung s20fe and the updates that are always late, wish pineapple would use the uphone 11 shape and 6.1 this pro is a big 5 se ?
